name: teams-get-templates
title: Collect and export Teams templates
shortDescription: This script allow us to collect and export current tenant Teams Templates
longDescription: Currently there's no out of the box way of exporting current teams templates. The script uses Teams Native API and is a subset of the SPO powershell packages with content (PnPCandy) concept already been used across many projects.

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
